name: The Ally's Mix
description:
Update: There's a new version of this model which adds SD 1.5 and a touch of Dreamlike. Check it out! It's better! The Ally's Mix II: Churned

Hey! My mix is a blend of models which has become quite popular with users of Cmdr2's UI. It's a more forgiving and easier to prompt SD1.4 - a true general purpose model, producing great portraits and landscapes.

It's a mix of Waifu Diffusion 1.2 and Stable Diffusion 1.4, with a further Sigmoid Interpolated NovelAI mix.

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally

I have a small tutorial for using the model here - not that there's anything special about prompting it - but for people not familiar with Danbooru tags, it might be helpful!

https://theally.notion.site/The-Ally-s-SD-WD-NAI-Model-Guide-de10c88e81e7456c82245663e2b06f10

It sucks that PickelTensor has flagged the model as sus - it's a mix of official models, all scanned for exploits before merging. It's no less safe than any of its' constituent parts.

There are no trigger words required.

modelVersions.name: V1.0 Safetensors
modelVersions.description: Safe version, should you be worried about getting itchy rashes from the ckpt.

meta.prompt: closeup portrait of a cute blonde Elsa in a bright windy field, (backlighting), realistic, masterpiece, highest quality, ((corset)), ((embarrassed)),  puddle, lens flare, shade, bloom, ((light sparkles)), [chromatic aberration], by Jeremy Lipking, by Antonio J. Manzanedo, by (Alphonse Mucha), digital painting
